thread.title_full: Great weekend in New York city - Review of Archer Hotel New York, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Donna E
title: Great weekend in New York city
text:
Great hotel , great location , excellent service at a very reasonable price . Would go back in a heart beat!!! They gave us $20.00 credit for in house purchase for booking direct , a nice little perk!!
Room Tip: We had a view of the street and an end room , a little street noise but not a bother at all. Far en... See more room tips
